name: Janky Time per Processing Time Metric
description: The percentage of time spent processing a scroll that we consider janky

histograms.name: janky_time_per_scroll_processing_time_percentage
histograms.description: The percentage of time we consider janky of the total time spent on scrolling.

histograms.name: gesture_scroll_milliseconds
histograms.description: The time in milliseconds we spent scrolling this trace.

histograms.name: janky_gesture_scroll_milliseconds
histograms.description: The time in milliseconds we spent scrolling this trace that we consider janky.

histograms.name: gesture_scroll_processing_milliseconds
histograms.description: The time in milliseconds we spent processing updates to the scroll this trace.

histograms.name: num_janky_gesture_scroll_updates
histograms.description: The number of individual gesture scroll updates that we considered janky.
